alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Grayson; Hardin; Larue; Marion (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 8:16PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nelson, central Larue, northwestern Marion, east central Grayson, southwestern Washington, Hardin and south central Bullitt Counties through 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/... At 815 PM EST/715 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms across central Hardin and Nelson counties, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elizabethtown around 820 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bardstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
